name: Kawaii Planet Craft
description:
Kawaii Planet Craft - start the game and start creating your amazing beautiful dimension with kawaii cubes and objects, reveal the will of your fantasy to embody any ideas and creative structures!

Build your figures, houses, shopping centers, restaurants, cafes, hairdressers, jewelry shops and much more.

Launch the game and start creating your world from various beautiful cubes and prepared objects.

Easily place the building blocks you want to place and create everything you can imagine.
Fly or walk through the vast expanses of the Kawaii Planet Craft.

Stunning features Kawaii Planet Craft:
- Amazing sweet textures
- Cool graphics
-Dragon and riding horse and chariot
- Perfect game for boys and girls
- Easy to download and install
- Creative mode, survival mode, kawaii mode
- Create powerful weapons and armor
- Creating incredible charming buildings
- Free craft games, villages, creative cities, houses and farms
- Cute animals
- The best craft adventure in the world Kawaii Planet


Rate us 5 star to continue to improve the game, we are working on much more big stuffs!

Enjoy!
developers: PANGO GAMES MOBIL UYGULAMA VE OYUN GELISTIRME TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: PANGO GAMES MOBIL UYGULAMA VE OYUN GELISTIRME TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
